# INTextNoteContent

**Class**

The textual content of a note.

## Declaration

```swift
class INTextNoteContent
```

## Initializing the Text Note

- **init(text:)**: Initializes a text-based note with the specified content.

## Getting the Note Text

- **text**: Text from the main content of the note.

## Note Objects

- **INNote**: The content and metadata associated with a single note entry in your app.
- **INNoteContent**: An abstract class that defines the types of content contained in notes.
- **INImageNoteContent**: An image contained in a note.

## Inherits From

- INNoteContent

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
